subject: SSN3641
description_text:
Hello,

Wanted to ask about the status of the order in the subject line and whether it’s being processed as express shipping since it was placed a week ago. 

Thank you!

conversations.body_text: Hi Mihai Patrascu,  We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by the logistics delay. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, with restocking expected to be completed by the 28th. At that time, we will ship your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping fees.

Hello,

Thank you for the update. No problem. I just wanted to know whether the
order is being processed or not. Have a nice day!

În joi, 27 nov. 2025 la 10:19, service@simsonn.com
